languages.text: {n}Кассия молча слушает ваши слова, опустив ресницы и чуть склонив голову. Едва заметная улыбка закрадывается в уголки ее губ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия молча слушает ваши слова, опустив ресницы и чут склонив голову. Едва заметная улбыка закрадывается в уголки ее губ.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅低着脑袋，垂下眼睫，一语不发地听着。她的唇边浮现出一丝隐约的笑意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅低着脑袋，垂下眼睫，一语不发地听着。她的唇边浮现出一丝隐约的笑意。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia hört schweigend zu, mit halb geschlossenen Lidern und leicht gesenktem Kopf. Ein kaum merkliches Lächeln spielt um ihre Mundwinkel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hört schweigend zu, mit halb geschlossenen Lidern und leicht gesenktem Kopf. Ein kaum merkliches Lächeln spielt um ihre Mundwinkel.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia écoute en silence, les cils baissés et la tête légèrement inclinée. Un sourire à peine visible étire les coins de sa bouche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia écoute en silence, les cils baissés et la tête légèrement inclinée. Un sourire à peine visible étire les coins de sa bouche.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia escucha en silencio, con la mirada y la cabeza ligeramente inclinadas. Una sonrisa apenas perceptible se dibuja en la comisura de sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは黙って聞き入っている。彼女のまつげが伏せられ、頭がわずかに下を向く。ほとんど気付かないほどの微笑みが、彼女の口の端に浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは黙って聞き入っている。彼女のまつげが伏せられ、頭がわずかに下を向く。ほとんど気付かないほどの微笑みが、彼女の口の端に浮かぶ。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, sesini çıkarmadan dinliyor. Kirpikleri düşük, başı hafif öne eğik. Ağzının kenarında belli belirsiz bir gülümseme var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia listens in silence, her eyelashes lowered and her head slightly bowed. A barely noticeable smile tugs at the corners of her mouth.{/n}
